{
  "title": "Introduction to Probability and Statistics",
  "authors": [
    "William Mendenhall",
    "Robert J. Beaver",
    "Barbara M. Beaver"
  ],
  "journal": "",
  "year": 2012,
  "url": "https://books.google.com/books/about/Introduction_to_Probability_and_Statisti.html?id=E6Qe_kriVfQC",
  "doi": "",
  "abstract": "This book provides a comprehensive introduction to the concepts and techniques of statistics and probability.",
  "relevance": "The book contains foundational knowledge on how to calculate mean, median, mode etc. which is directly relevant to the research goal."
}

{
  "title": "Statistics: The Art and Science of Learning from Data",
  "authors": [
    "Alan Agresti",
    "Christine A. Franklin",
    "Bernhard Klingenberg"
  ],
  "journal": "",
  "year": 2017,
  "url": "https://www.amazon.com/Statistics-Science-Learning-4th/dp/0133860910",
  "doi": "",
  "abstract": "This book covers tools and techniques of statistics and is designed to guide students to become savvy consumers of data.",
  "relevance": "It provides necessary information on calculating mean which is central to the research goal."
}

{
  "title": "Basic Biostatistics: Statistics for Public Health Practice",
  "authors": [
    "B. Burt Gerstman"
  ],
  "journal": "",
  "year": 2014,
  "url": "https://books.google.com/books/about/Basic_Biostatistics.html?id=goXNBQAAQBAJ",
  "doi": "",
  "abstract": "This book provides an introduction to biostatistics and its application to health science.",
  "relevance": "The book gives a practical introduction to calculating mean, which is directly relevant to the research goal."
}
